title: 每次创建新的世界就崩溃
author: Exproject
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Exproject 于 2020-5-21 11:18 编辑 

如题

2020-5-21 11:17 上传

replies.author: 美味的曲奇
replies.txt_content: 移除[泡沫修复]foamfix-0.10.10-1.12.2.jar可以使用吗

replies.author: 美味的曲奇
replies.txt_content: 似乎这个锅不是[泡沫修复]就是'version'的锅

replies.author: 吹笙花影
replies.txt_content:
你的很多个核心mod版本错误  建议都去下载1.12.2的最新版本
JustEnoughCharacters: https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/just-enough-characters
cxlibrary: https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/cxlibrary
Forgelin: https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/shadowfacts-forgelin
Xaeros_Minimap: https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/xaeros-minimap
IvToolkit: https://mods.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/224535-ivtoolkit
ChunkAnimator: https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/chunk-animator
ResourceLoader: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/resource-loader
仔细看看其它mod版本对不对 你这太多mod和游戏版本不一样了

replies.author: CMMC
replies.txt_content:
[JEI拼音搜索]JustEnoughCharacters
[泡沫修复]foamfix
[区块加载动画]ChunkAnimator
[万用皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge
JustEnoughIDs
这些不用在服务端安装啊

replies.author: xqx145236
replies.txt_content:
把一些可选mod删掉
这些装在服务端没啥用处，而且还会崩，客户端装了就行了
[JEI拼音搜索]JustEnoughCharacters
[泡沫修复]foamfix
[区块加载动画]ChunkAnimator
[万用皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge
JustEnoughIDs
如果可以了话点下最佳答案谢谢
